description:
ColorHarmony is great for any type of designer to get some ideas for color schemes right in your hand! The Kuler website is only available as Flash site, not useable on a smartphone.
ColorHarmony helps you to stay connected to the colors of Kuler!
ColorHarmony connects you to the Adobe Kuler service to provide you with access to thousands of color schemes.
- View the color values for any color scheme.
- Search for color schemes by tag or title 
- See other information such as rating and author 
- Share a theme via Mail 
- Preview Fullscreen 
- Bookmark Option for Offline usage 
- Shake for random colors 
- Preferences 
- added color value search
No idea what colors to use for a specific project? Try ColorHarmony!


New in v1.5.0
- bookmark limit no longer exists, save more than 5 bookmarks!
- neato! support
- Preview of a theme now directly accessible in the details
- update handling
versionNote: - fixed some issues for the TouchPad
